amendment.description: To require a study of the Moving to Work demonstration program, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2198 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2198 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14938-14939; text: CR S14938-14939) To require a study of the Moving to Work demonstration program, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2198 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
